Title: Relates to bus lane restrictions in New York city
Summary: Provides that it shall be a defense to any prosecution for a violation of a bus lane restriction pursuant to a bus rapid transit program when an employee of the metropolitan transportation authority is performing authorized duties on behalf of such authority and is operating an authorized employer motor vehicle in the bus lane at the time of the violation and conducting lawful business or providing service to an official metropolitan transportation authority vehicle or personnel while in a bus lane.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to an affirmative defense for bus lane restrictions in New York city
